author: Byron Pulsifer
message: Wishes can be your best avenue of getting what you want when you turn wishes into action. Action moves your wish to the forefront from thought to reality.
title: Thought of the day

author: Kahlil Gibran
message: To understand the heart and mind of a person, look not at what he has already achieved, but at what he aspires to do.
title: Thought of the day

author: Bernard Shaw
message: I am of the opinion that my life belongs to the community, and as long as I live it is my privilege to do for it whatever I can.
title: Thought of the day

author: Albert Einstein
message: Imagination is more important than knowledge. For while knowledge defines all we currently know and understand, imagination points to all we might yet discover and create.
title: Thought of the day
